{IERC20-allowance}."},"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-approve}. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"See {IERC20-balanceOf}."},"decimals()":{"details":"Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless this function is overridden; NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}."},"decreaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`."},"getBalance(address)":{"details":"\uc785\ub825\ud55c \uc9c0\uac11 \uc8fc\uc18c\uc758 \uc794\uc561\uc744 \uc870\ud68c","params":{"wallet":"\uc870\ud68c\ud560 \uc9c0\uac11"},"returns":{"_0":"\ud574\ub2f9 \uc9c0\uac11 \uc218\ub7c9 \ubc18\ud658"}},"increaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"name()":{"details":"Returns the name of the token."},"sendTokens(address,uint256)":{"details":"\uc77c\ubc18 \uc0ac\uc6a9\uc790\ub9cc \ud1a0\ud070\uc744 \uc785\ub825\ud55c \uc8fc\uc18c\ub85c \ubcf4\ub0b8\ub2e4.","params":{"_amount":"\ubcf4\ub0bc \ud1a0\ud070\uc758 \uc591\uc744 \uc785\ub825","_to":"\ubcf4\ub0bc \uc8fc\uc18c\ub97c \uc785\ub825"}},"symbol()":{"details":"Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name."},"tokenBurn(address,uint256)":{"details":"\uc8fc\uc18c\uc640 \ud1a0\ud070 \uc591\uc744 \uc801\uc5b4\uc11c \ubcf4\ub0b8\ub2e4. _burn \ud568\uc218\uc5d0\uc11c \ud1a0\ud070\uc744 \uc0dd\uc131\ud55c\ub2e4.","params":{"_amount":"\ud1a0\ud070 \uc591","from":"\ubc1b\uc744 \uc9c0\uac11 \uc8fc\uc18c"}},"tokenMint(address,uint256)":{"details":"\uc8fc\uc18c\uc640 \ud1a0\ud070 \uc591\uc744 \uc801\uc5b4\uc11c \ubcf4\ub0b8\ub2e4. _mint \ud568\uc218\uc5d0\uc11c \ud1a0\ud070\uc744 \uc0dd\uc131\ud55c\ub2e4.","params":{"_amount":"\ud1a0\ud070 \uc591","to":"\ubc1b\uc744 \uc9c0\uac11 \uc8fc\uc18c"}},"tokenName()":{"details":"\ud1a0\ud070 \uc774\ub984 \uc870\ud68c","returns":{"_0":"\ud574\ub2f9 \ud1a0\ud070 \uc774\ub984 \ubc18\ud658"}},"tokenPause(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"\ud574\ub2f9 \uacc4\uc57d\uc744 \uc77c\uc2dc \uc911\uc9c0\ud55c\ub2e4.","params":{"_amount":"\ubcf4\ub0b8 \ud1a0\ud070\uc758 \uc591","_from":"\ubcf4\ub0b4\ub294 \uc9c0\uac11 \uc8fc\uc18c","_to":"\ubc1b\ub294 \uc9c0\uac11 \uc8fc\uc18c"}},"totalSupply()":{"details":"See {IERC20-totalSupply}."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20}. Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``sender``'s tokens of at least
